title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Challenge Cost Share
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners     Challenge Cost Share              Challenge Cost Share      The National Park Service Challenge Cost Share Program provides up to $25,000 in matching funds to support projects that promote conservation and recreation, environmental stewardship, education, and engaging diverse youth participants in national parks, trails, heritage areas, and wild and scenic rivers. For more information visit: www.nps.gov/orgs/1453/ccsp.htm
